sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: Only Education was facing the complex task of asserting credibility and visibility in an oversaturated EdTech environment. Despite a growing user base, the brand lacked a centralised strategy to attract and retain students across disciplines. Their website did not reflect their pedagogical strengths, and the marketing funnel was fragmented, impacting both traffic and conversions.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit delivered a comprehensive brand overhaul by producing high-quality ad films, educational content, and professional branding videos. The team launched a robust SEO strategy, segmented social media campaigns, LinkedIn positioning, and automated marketing workflows through email and WhatsApp. Technical enhancements to the site structure, content architecture, and GMB optimisation were also undertaken to boost discoverability.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Post-intervention, Only Education saw a 65% uplift in organic keyword visibility and a 50% rise in qualified web traffic. Social media engagement rates improved by 90%, and advertising efficiency increased through a 25% reduction in cost-per-acquisition. The result was a unified digital presence that positioned Only Education as a trustworthy and technologically advanced academic counselling platform in India.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: NEETGyan, despite having substantial educational content, struggled to compete in the crowded NEET preparation market. The site lacked targeted SEO refinement, which hindered its ability to rank for high-volume exam queries. This led to missed opportunities in attracting organic student traffic and building authority.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RankKit implemented a precision-based SEO strategy tailored to NEET-specific searches. This included granular keyword research across Physics, Chemistry, and Biology topics, along with technical improvements such as mobile responsiveness, structured data integration, and Core Web Vitals optimisation. A focused backlink acquisition plan was also put into place through academic domains and student forums.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: As a result, NEETGyan saw a 50% surge in organic traffic to its course and resource pages. The site achieved top-three rankings for several competitive keywords, driving substantial increases in mock test registrations and course sign-ups. This solidified NEETGyan’s position as a reliable digital destination for NEET aspirants.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: The Kerala Table needed a premium yet traditional brand presence. We emphasized regional aesthetics while keeping a modern UX flow.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: Menu CMS, delivery modules, and feedback loops were all built into the system. A smooth ordering experience across devices.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Online orders increased 3x and repeat customer rate jumped to 65% within 2 months.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: Focused on engineering students, we built a high-performance interface for tests, rankings, and mentorship dashboards.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: Engineering exam data is dense. We used visual hierarchy and progressive disclosure to make it digestible.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Increased average time-on-site to 12+ minutes and 45% rise in session engagement.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: We created an elegant and dynamic interface for MBA entrance preparation. Smart filters and analytics helped users make informed decisions.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: We built mock test modules, real-time leaderboards, and mentorship scheduling into the portal.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Average course completion rate increased by 58% post-revamp

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: A powerful school management ERP needed a modern frontend. We prioritized admin dashboards and parent-teacher UX.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: Attendance, assignments, results, and notifications — all digitized and integrated into a mobile-friendly interface.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Reduced admin time by 43% and 98% parent engagement in school updates.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: Bake Ur Day wanted a playful yet minimal brand identity for their bakery. We used pastel colors, handwritten fonts, and micro-interactions.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: RWe simplified the product cart and checkout flow to increase order conversions.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Revenue doubled in 3 months post-launch, and user reviews praised the delightful experience.

sections.heading: The Challenge
sections.description: Toy Room needed a website that’s fun for kids but functional for parents. We used bright visuals with smooth UX transitions.

sections.heading: The Solution
sections.description: We integrated an eCommerce system with easy filtering, bundle deals, and video previews.

sections.heading: The Impact
sections.description: Customer satisfaction rated 4.9/5. Average cart size grew by 2.4x after redesign.
